name.ja: <ruby>名<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>匠<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>兜<rt>かぶと</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains 200 ATK/DEF. Also, if the equipped monster is "Master Craftsman Kotetsu" or a Legend monster whose original Level is 4 or lower, it gains ATK equal to [its original ATK].
